text: Sunnyvale is a city in the U.S. state of California. It is near San Francisco and San Jose. It is the seventh most populated city in the San Francisco Bay Area. It is in Santa Clara County and Silicon Valley. As of the 2020 census, 155,805 people were living in Sunnyvale. Many technology companies have operations in Sunnyvale. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Cities in the San Francisco Bay Area Category:Settlements in Santa Clara County, California
title: Sunnyvale, California
